body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah "Sallie" Glaisbrooks Averitt in Washington County, Kentucky, on December 18, 1829. Father of James F. Averitt and Mary F. Averitt. Married to Susan Kennett Averitt. Father of Maudy Averitt, Susannah Averitt, Analisa Averitt and John S. Averitt. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Farmer in Marion County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860. Household owned an additional seven enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860.
